name: Slime Game (LD43)
description:
You are a slime that must sacrifice pieces of itself to complete puzzle-platformer levels.

This game borrows the Ludum Dare 43 theme, which was "sacrifices must be made". This game was developed for fun over a weekend and was not formally submitted for any contest or game jam.

Created using Godot (https://godotengine.org/).

Controls

  • A/D - move
  • Space - jump
  • S - sacrifice a piece of yourself and create a small slime ball
  • W - absorb a slime ball
  • R - restart level
  • Tab - zoom out / in

Credits

  • Game design, level design, and art by Alex Karger (https://www.alexkarger.com/)
  • Programming by Firebelley (https://firebelley.com)
